00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief Overload matlabs function use to add objects. Add discretization
00003 %> grid objects (add objects value_list vectors).
00004 %> Dimension of p and q must be the same.
00005 %> @param p discretization grid object
00006 %> @param q discretization grid object
00007 %> @retval r discretization grid object
00008 % =====================================================================
00009 function r = plus( p,q )
00010 
00011     if size(p)==size(q)
00012         p = Discretization_grid_2D_square(p);
00013         q = Discretization_grid_2D_square(q);
00014         new_value_list=p.value_list+q.value_list;
00015         r = Discretization_grid_2D_square(p.matrix_size_mm,p.grid_size_mm);
00016         r.value_list=new_value_list;
00017     else
00018         error('Add two discretization grid objects: size is different');
00019     end
00020 end
